solution_line_template: First find how long Nicky spent waiting for his number to be called: {quadruple_multiplier} * {time_waiting_to_take_number} minutes + {extra_wait_for_number} minutes = <<{quadruple_multiplier}*{time_waiting_to_take_number}+{extra_wait_for_number}={time_waiting_for_number_called}>>{time_waiting_for_number_called} minutes

Then add the time he spent waiting to take a number: {time_waiting_for_number_called} + {time_waiting_to_take_number} = <<{time_waiting_for_number_called}+{time_waiting_to_take_number}={total_wait_time}>>{total_wait_time} minutes
